title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements through stakeholder interviews, market research, and analysis of existing systems.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including data models, integration points, scalability considerations, security measures, performance optimizations, and a clear plan for testing and validating the design. The design will aim to eliminate data silos for global port terminals and inland logistics facilities, providing near-real-time visibility into operational and financial metrics.

title: Data Integration and ETL
description: Develop strategies and mechanisms for integrating data from various sources, including port terminals and logistics facilities.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store and manage operational and financial data for global port terminals and inland logistics facilities. The database should support efficient data retrieval, updates, and analytics for near-real-time visibility. Consider data partitioning, indexing, caching strategies (such as Redis or Memcached), and query optimization techniques for optimal performance. Ensure data integrity, security, and compliance with industry standards and regulations applicable to the logistics and maritime industries. Additionally, consider the use of a distributed database system such as Google's Spanner or Amazon's DynamoDB to handle the global scale of the project.

title: User Interface and Reporting
description: Design and develop the user interface for data visualization, reporting, and analytics.

title: Security and Access Control (v2)
description: Implement robust security measures, including authentication, authorization, and data encryption, to ensure data privacy and integrity. Also, consider implementing Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) for secure user management.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, including continuous integration, continuous deployment, and monitoring.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and implement a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials.
